name: Galactix (itch)
description:
Overview:

Galactix is a turn-based dungeon crawler set in space. You navigate the randomly generated corridors and rooms of broken space ships and stations, collecting money and trying to escape space slimes and corrupted mining bots. Between each mission, you return to your base, which you can upgrade.

Features:

  • Turn Based(-ish) combat
  • Upgradable space station
  • SPAAAAAAACE

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

[Space] - Activate Tile

[Shift] - Toggle fullscreen

[Esc] - Restart room

[Mouse] - Aim

A Game a Week [Week 3]:

This game is my third game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. Stay tuned!
